imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters

Class BilateralFilterSeparable

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.filters.GenericFilter
      • imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters.BilateralFilter
        • imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters.BilateralFilterSeparable

  • public class BilateralFilterSeparable
extends BilateralFilter
    XY-Separated version of bilateral filter using Gaussian domain and range kernels. This filter can be applied to all image types.
    Version:
    2013/05/30

      • applyTo

        public void applyTo(ij.process.ImageProcessor target)
        Description copied from class: GenericFilter
        Dispatch work depending on actual (runtime) type of processor. This is ugly but we want to avoid generic types (which would not be of much help in this case anyway).
        Overrides:
        applyTo in class GenericFilter
        Parameters:
        target - the image this filter is applied to (destructively)
